channel.title: Runes/barrage

anyone help,
thanks,

item.title: Runes/barrage
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:17, topic:262608”]deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6);

You forgot to change the getItemSlot.[/quote]

item.title: Runes/barrage
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6);

You forgot to change the getItemSlot.

Read full topic

item.title: Runes/barrage
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Change this -

deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 6);

To this -

deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(554), 6);

If you just examine the code, it’s not that hard…You are required to use 5 of the item 555, so you must delete 5 of the item 555.

Read full topic

item.title: Runes/barrage
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:14, topic:262608”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=346760.msg2671052#msg2671052 date=1234825385]

if (spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if (playerLevel[6] > 93) { if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 40) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 60) == false)) { sendMessage( "You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage( "You need 40 " + getItemName(560) + ", 40 " + getItemName(565) + " and 60 " + getItemName(555)); } else if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 40) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60) == true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); startAnimation(1979); castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer(); castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); // stillgfx(387, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); // castOnPlayer.stillgfx(387, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 40); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(555), 60); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if (playerLevel[6] <= 124) { sendMessage( "You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell."); } }

now it says that and yes i do… i want it so u dont need fire runes in your invent…

note:

wait…

if (spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if (playerLevel[6] > 93) { if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 40) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 60) == false)) { sendMessage( "You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage( "You need 40 " + getItemName(560) + ", 40 " + getItemName(565) + " and 60 " + getItemName(555)); } else if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 40) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60) == true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); startAnimation(1979); castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer(); castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); // stillgfx(387, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); // castOnPlayer.stillgfx(387, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 40); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(555), 60); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if (playerLevel[6] <= 124) { sendMessage( "You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell."); } }

if (magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if (playerLevel[6] >= 94) { if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6) == false)) { sendMessage( "You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6) == true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); setAnimation(1979); // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].PoisonPlayer(); // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].uberentangle(); // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; addSkillXP((800 * playerLevel[6]), 6); // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); // sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff; } } else if (playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage( "You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

both of those are next to each other…
[/quote]

That is because one is for attacking a player, while the other is for attacking an NPC. The rune requirements are at the beginning of both methods.[/quote]

chassy, i already know that but when i try to do barrage with those runes, it doesnt work…

if i then get the runes and fire runes it then works but doesnt even use the fire runes…

how do i make it so it just works for water, deaths and blood runes to make it barrage…?

Read full topic

item.title: Runes/barrage
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:12, topic:262608”] if (spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if (playerLevel[6] > 93) { if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 40) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 60) == false)) { sendMessage( "You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage( "You need 40 " + getItemName(560) + ", 40 " + getItemName(565) + " and 60 " + getItemName(555)); } else if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 40) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60) == true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); startAnimation(1979); castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer(); castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); // stillgfx(387, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); // castOnPlayer.stillgfx(387, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 40); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(555), 60); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if (playerLevel[6] <= 124) { sendMessage( "You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell."); } }

now it says that and yes i do… i want it so u dont need fire runes in your invent…

note:

wait…

if (spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if (playerLevel[6] > 93) { if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 40) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 60) == false)) { sendMessage( "You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage( "You need 40 " + getItemName(560) + ", 40 " + getItemName(565) + " and 60 " + getItemName(555)); } else if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 40) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60) == true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); startAnimation(1979); castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer(); castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); // stillgfx(387, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); // castOnPlayer.stillgfx(387, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 40); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(555), 60); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if (playerLevel[6] <= 124) { sendMessage( "You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell."); } }

if (magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if (playerLevel[6] >= 94) { if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6) == false)) { sendMessage( "You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6) == true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); setAnimation(1979); // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].PoisonPlayer(); // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].uberentangle(); // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; addSkillXP((800 * playerLevel[6]), 6); // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); // sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff; } } else if (playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage( "You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

both of those are next to each other…[/quote]

That is because one is for attacking a player, while the other is for attacking an NPC. The rune requirements are at the beginning of both methods.

item.title: Runes/barrage
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Haxafer, post:8, topic:262608”] } else if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == true)
&& (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2) == true)
&& (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6) == true)) {

change playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)
^ ^

first number is the rune id and second is the amount.

eg 560 = death
4 means you need 4 deaths.[/quote]

i know that. but if i try to barrage with those runes it doesnt let me.

i need fire runes (id is 554) in my invent and it will barrage but wont use the fire runes…

and in the code for barrage, there is only 554 once so it must be something to do with that…

if (magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if (playerLevel[6] >= 94) { if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6) == false)) { sendMessage( "You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6) == true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); setAnimation(1979); // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].PoisonPlayer(); // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].uberentangle(); // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; addSkillXP((800 * playerLevel[6]), 6); // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); // sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff; } } else if (playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage( "You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

this is the code.

the problem im having is that when i try to do barrage in the server, i have to have fires in my invent to make it barrage correctly.

i can only see 554 (fire id) once in the code but im not to sure if that will make it barrage correctly without having fire runes in my invent.

Read full topic
